text: aur jin logon ne kuphr ekhteyaar kiya unakee kaarastaaniyaan (aisee hai) jaise ek chatiyal maidaan ka chamakata hua baaloo ki pyaasa us ko door se dekhe to paanee khyaal karata hai yahaan tak ki jab usake paas aaya to usako kuchh bhee na paaya (aur pyaas se tadap kar mar gaya) aur khuda ko apane paas maujood paaya to usane usaka hisaab (kitaab) poora poora chuka diya aur khuda to bahut jald hisaab lene vaala hai
